item.title: 【Neural Networks: From Perceptrons to Deep Learning】神经网络：从感知器到深度学习
item.description:
【

From being inspired by the human brain to developing sophisticated models that allow for wonderful feats, the journey of neural networks has truly come a long way. In the following blog, we will discuss in depth the technical journey of neural networks — from the basic perceptron to advanced deep learning architectures driving AI innovations today.

The Human System

The human brain contains an estimated 86 billion neurons, all adjacent to each other and connected via synapses. Each neuron receives signals through the dendrites, then processes these through the soma, and sends its output down the axon to post-synaptic neurons. This complex network is how the brain is able to process vast amounts of information and perform exceedingly complex tasks.

】

从受人脑启发到开发复杂的模型以实现精彩的壮举，神经网络的旅程 确实已经取得了长足的进步。在下面的博客中，我们将深入讨论神经网络的技术历程——从基本感知器到推动当今人工智能创新的高级深度学习架构。

人体系统

人类大脑估计包含 860 亿个神经元，所有神经元都彼此相邻并通过突触连接。每个神经元通过树突接收信号，然后通过体细胞处理这些信号，并将其输出沿着轴突发送到突触后神经元。这个复杂的网络是大脑处理大量信息并执行极其复杂任务的方式。

item.title: 【Why and How We Built a Primary-Replica Architecture of ClickHouse】我们为何以及如何构建 ClickHouse 主副本架构
item.description:
【

Our company uses artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning to streamline the comparison and purchasing process for car insurance and car loans. As our data grew, we had problems with AWS Redshift which was slow and expensive. Changing to ClickHouse made our query performance faster and greatly cut our costs. But this also caused storage challenges like disk failures and data recovery.

To avoid extensive maintenance, we adopted JuiceFS, a distributed file system with high performance. We innovatively use its snapshot feature to implement a primary-replica architecture for ClickHouse. This architecture ensures high availability and stability of the data while significantly enhancing system performance and data recovery capabilities. Over more than a year, it has operated without downtime and replication errors, delivering expected performance.

】

我们公司使用人工智能 (AI) 和机器学习来简化汽车保险和汽车贷款的比较和购买流程。随着数据的增长，我们遇到了 AWS Redshift 的问题，它速度慢且成本高。更改为 ClickHouse 使我们的查询性能更快，并大大降低了我们的成本。但这也带来了磁盘故障和数据恢复等存储挑战。

为了避免大量维护，我们采用了高性能的分布式文件系统JuiceFS。我们创新性地利用其快照功能为ClickHouse实现了主副本架构。该架构保证了数据的高可用性和稳定性，同时显着增强了系统性能和数据恢复能力。一年多来，它一直运行，没有出现停机和复制错误，提供了预期的性能。

item.title: 【Avoiding Prompt-Lock: Why Simply Swapping LLMs Can Lead to Failure】避免立即锁定：为什么简单地交换法学硕士会导致失败
item.description:
【

The mantra in the world of generative AI models today is "the latest is the greatest," but that’s far from the case. We are lured (and spoiled) by choice with new models popping up left and right. Good problem to have? Maybe, but it comes with a big opportunity: model fatigue. There’s an issue that has the potential to wreak havoc on your ML initiatives: prompt lock-in.

Models today are so accessible that at the click of a button, anyone can virtually begin prototyping by pulling models from a repository like HuggingFace. Sounds too good to be true? That’s because it is. There are dependencies baked into models that can break your project. The prompt you perfected for GPT-3.5 will likely not work as expected in another model, even one with comparable benchmarks or from the same “model family.” Each model has its own nuances, and prompts must be tailored to these specificities to get the desired results.

】

当今生成式 AI 模型的口头禅是“最新的就是最好的”，但事实并非如此。我们被不断涌现的新车型所吸引（和宠坏）。好问题有吗？也许吧，但它带来了一个巨大的机会：模型疲劳。有一个问题可能会对您的机器学习计划造成严重破坏：提示锁定。

如今的模型非常易于访问，只需单击一个按钮，任何人都可以通过从 HuggingFace 等存储库中提取模型来开始原型设计。听起来好得令人难以置信？那是因为它是。模型中包含的依赖项可能会破坏您的项目。您针对 GPT-3.5 完善的提示可能无法在另一种模型中按预期工作，即使是具有可比基准或来自相同“模型系列”的模型。每个模型都有自己的细微差别，必须根据这些特殊性定制提示才能获得所需的结果。

item.title: 【What Does It Take to Manage an On-Premise vs Cloud Data Security Product?】管理本地数据安全产品与云数据安全产品需要什么？
item.description:
【

Before we ponder this question, let’s first understand the major differences between an on-premise and a cloud data security product. An on-premise data security product means the management console is on the enterprise customer’s premises, whereas the security vendor hosts a cloud data security product in the cloud. Security vendors aid customers by providing clear guidance on installing and maintaining an on-premise solution. Customers are responsible for the hardware, OS, and product configuration to protect against threats and sensitive data leaks. The security vendors manage cloud solutions, and enterprise customers must configure the product to meet their needs.

You might ask, "Why would an enterprise customer take on the burden of managing the installation and maintenance of the product, given that configuring and making it work already poses a significant toll on them?" Great question! Not all enterprise customers are comfortable having their data stored in the cloud along with other customers (typically, this happens in a multi-tenant cloud deployment). You might wonder why not opt for a private cloud. Of course, they can opt for a private cloud, nevertheless, the data is not entirely under their control. Security vendors manage the account and the data.

】

在思考这个问题之前，我们首先了解一下本地数据安全产品和云数据安全产品之间的主要区别。本地数据安全产品意味着管理控制台位于企业客户的本地，而安全供应商在云端托管云数据安全产品。安全供应商通过提供有关安装和维护本地解决方案的明确指导来帮助客户。客户负责硬件、操作系统和产品配置，以防止威胁和敏感数据泄露。安全供应商管理云解决方案，企业客户必须配置产品以满足他们的需求。

您可能会问，“既然配置和使其正常工作已经给企业客户带来了巨大的损失，为什么企业客户还要承担管理产品安装和维护的负担呢？”好问题！并非所有企业客户都愿意将其数据与其他客户一起存储在云中（通常，这种情况发生在 多租户云部署）。您可能想知道为什么不选择私有云。当然，他们可以选择私有云，但是数据并不完全在他们的控制之下。安全供应商管理帐户和数据。

item.title: 【Our Shift From Cypress to Playwright in Testing】我们在测试中从赛普拉斯到剧作家的转变
item.description:
【

In our post about extensive-react-boilerplate updates, we mentioned that we migrated e2e-testing from Cypress to Playwright. Now, let's delve a little deeper into this change.

At the time of writing the automated tests, we had a small amount of functionality to cover and didn't face significant limitations when using Cypress. Yet, we decided to turn our attention to Playwright for several reasons. We wanted to explore the framework created by Microsoft and understand why it is gaining popularity. Additionally, similar to the case when we added MongoDB support, we received requests from the community and colleagues who wanted to start a project based on boilerplate with Playwright tests.

】

在我们关于extense-react-boilerplate更新的文章中，我们提到我们将 e2e 测试从 Cypress 迁移到 Playwright。现在，让我们更深入地研究这一变化。

在编写自动化测试时，我们需要覆盖少量功能，并且在使用 Cypress 时没有遇到重大限制。然而，出于几个原因，我们决定将注意力转向剧作家。我们想要探索 Microsoft 创建的框架并了解它为何越来越受欢迎。此外，与我们添加 MongoDB 支持时的情况类似，我们收到了来自社区和同事的请求，他们希望启动一个基于样板文件并进行 Playwright 测试的项目。
